subject: Golf
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis is back to try to defend her title in the L.P.G.A.’s Kraft Nabisco Championship after earning a spot in KPMG’s sports marketing stable.
snippet: Stacy Lewis is back to try to defend her title in the L.P.G.A.’s Kraft Nabisco Championship after earning a spot in KPMG’s sports marketing stable.
